ygData.subject: A message from an old friend to drill bit
ygData.msgSnippet: With the destruction of War s spark a hidden protocol in the hidden ship turned on. It had been dl d into Drill Bit s mind by War. It was a secret comm hidden

Received: from Kinger01030@... by imo-r14.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v29.5.) id a.37.f56dfb5 (4321) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Sat, 13 Jan 2001 19:24:59 -0500 (EST)
Message-ID: <37.f56dfb5.27924bd8@...>
Date: Sat, 13 Jan 2001 19:24:56 EST
Subject: A message from an old friend to drill bit
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

 With the destruction of War's spark a hidden protocol in the hidden ship 
turned on. It had been dl'd into Drill Bit's mind by War. It was a secret 
comm hidden in the bots brain. It turned on. "Drill Bit.... this message 
comes with sorrow. If you are hearing this I am dead and so is the council 
base. But hope still lives. The base destructor came in is still here! he 
only hid it from his enemies with a flashy light show and a fancy cloak 
device. Unfortunatly it's defences can only be put on-line by his hand. But I 
have a solution to that. I dl'd something in the computers after his death. 
Here are the coordinates of the base. Grid 7-5 alpha. All you have to do is 
copy destructor's voice wich I have dl'd into this comm. You will find it 
helpful it will decloak the base and open the main door. Go to the main 
computer counsol and hit the green button. That will solve the defence 
problem. I wish you good luck. And long live the predacon empire!"
